name: Ilse's Spinach Sausage Brunch Casserole
ingredients: 8 ounces provolone cheese, shredded and divided *
2 roasted red bell peppers, chopped, divided, 7 ounces *
10 ounces frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 tablespoons fresh basil, chopped, or 1 teaspoon dried

instructions.en: Brown sausage and onion; drain on paper towels.
instructions.sk: Opečte klobásu a cibuľu; nechajte odkvapkať na papierových utierka.
instructions.ja: ソーセージと玉ねぎを炒め、ペーパータオルで油を切ります。

instructions.en: Spread sausage in greased 9x13" baking dish. Layer with half provolone, half red pepper, spinach, and parmesan.
instructions.sk: Rozložte klobásu do vymastenej 23x33 cm zapekacej formy. Vrstvite polovicou provolone, polovicou červenej papriky, špenátom a parmezánom.
instructions.ja: 油を塗った9x13インチの焼き皿にソーセージを広げます。プロヴォローネチーズの半分、赤ピーマンの半分、ほうれん草、パルメザンチーズの順に重ねます。

instructions.en: Whisk eggs, cream, salt, and basil. Pour evenly over casserole.
instructions.sk: Vyšľahajte vajcia, smotanu, soľ a bazalku. Nalejte rovnomerne na zapekanku.
instructions.ja: 卵、生クリーム、塩、バジルを混ぜます。キャセロールの上に均等に注ぎます。

instructions.en: Bake at 425°F (220°C) for 20-25 minutes until knife inserted in center comes out clean and lightly browned.
instructions.sk: Pečte pri teplote 220°C 20-25 minút, kým nôž vložený do stredu nevyjde čistý a zapekanku nie je zľahka zhnednutá.
instructions.ja: 425°F（220°C）のオーブンで20-25分、中心に刺したナイフがきれいに抜け、軽く焼き色がつくまで焼きます。

instructions.en: Sprinkle remaining red peppers and provolone. Bake 2-3 minutes until cheese melts.
instructions.sk: Posypte zvyšnými červenými paprikami a provolone. Pečte 2-3 minúty, kým sa syr neroztopí.
instructions.ja: 残りの赤ピーマンとプロヴォローネチーズをかけます。チーズが溶けるまで2-3分焼きます。

instructions.en: Let stand 5 minutes before cutting into squares.
instructions.sk: Pred nakrájaním na štvorce nechajte 5 minút odstáť.
instructions.ja: 5分間置いてから正方形に切り分けます。

notes: Makes 8 servings. Can be frozen. * I couldn't find provolone cheese in a chunk so I bought a bag of shredded 6-cheese Italian blend which contained some provolone. You'll need to buy a 12 ounce jar of roasted red peppers to get two 3 1/2-ounce peppers.
